name: Napoleon Hill

jv_history.source_quote: Hill never dreamed an interview with Andrew Carnegie, industrialist and steel magnate, would change his life.

what_you_do: Napoleon Hill was an author whose philosophy of success, particularly through 'Think and Grow Rich,' has influenced millions of readers worldwide.
who_you_serve: Individuals seeking personal achievement, financial success, and self-improvement through Hill's philosophy.
social_proof: Author of 'Think and Grow Rich'; his Science of Success was assembled from knowledge of hundreds of prosperous people including Thomas Edison and Henry Ford.
signature_programs: Think and Grow Rich, Outwitting the Devil, Science of Success, Napoleon Hill Foundation publications
business_focus: Teaching a philosophy of success and achievement through published books and the Napoleon Hill Foundation.
